meta.author: EthanThatOneKid
meta.tagline: A Text based Adventure Game written in Javascript for Discord
meta.welcome: Welcome to MazeBot - The aim of the game is to find the exit gate and leave the maze.

room1.description: You are on the other side of a burnt broken bridge, you look back to see the debris and a steady stream of water. You turn around and see a fountain. (hint : navigate around to explore [ex: `go north`])
room1.contextualHelp: Look around and see if you can find something you can use

room8.description: You are at the exit gates!! You finally made it!! Thanks for playing MazeBot

room2.description: You are near the fountain. It is in front of a huge mansion. There is a half filled bottle of water just besides it
room2.contextualHelp: Water is helpful when you are dehydrated from all the walking around

room3.description: There are trees all around you. There is a sword lying besides you.
room3.contextualHelp: You can use swords to kill enemies

actions.pick sword: You have picked up a sword.

room4.description: Tall trees are all around you. A speck of light is coming from the south.

room5.description: There are trees all around you

room6.description: You have reached the entrance of the huge mansion. The door is locked and all the windows in the front are bolted
room6.contextualHelp: Huge mansions are a treasure of objects :)

room7.description: You are standing on the banks of a fast flowing river.
room7.contextualHelp: Ahh!! If only I knew where to go

room9.description: You approach a clearing in the forest.
room9.contextualHelp: The sun is cuter than you remember.

room10.description: A rainbow of petals from a wild collection of flowery specimens greet you as you enter a meadow.
room10.contextualHelp: There is a pretty flower beside you.

actions.frolick about: You experience the joy of a small child.

room11.description: You approach a spring of crystal clear water. Light dances on the soft current.
room11.contextualHelp: You take off your shoes and dip your feet into the refreshing water. You notice some tastey looking fishies swimming about.

actions.go fishing:
You dip your shoelace into the water and wait patiently...
...
...And when you least expected it, you hooked a hungry fish and reeled it in!
actions.reel in:
You dip your shoelace into the water and wait patiently...
...
...And when you least expected it, you hooked a hungry fish and reeled it in!

room12.description: You approach a large mountain. It is too steep to climb and the peak is beyond the clouds.

room13.description: The soil becomes sifting sand as you enter a desert biome beyond the mountain.
room13.contextualHelp:
You notice a corroding wooden sign staked into the sand. It reads:
+---------------------------------------------------+
| Do not get trapped by the eternally-flowing sand! |
|        Time beckons like the howling wind!        |
+---------------------------------------------------+
